nodes.text: Captain Beezrul Granf was the commander of the bulk freighter Colders Watch during the Galactic Civil War. In 0 ABY, his crew included First Mate Chessa Dohhenty and Chief Engineer Dirk Harkness. During a delivery to Kelada starport, Dohhenty was killed by stormtroopers due to her links to the Alliance to Restore the Republic and Harkness went on the run after killing the troopers in revenge.
